title: Mothron Egg
summaries: Mothron is a powerful flying Enemy that spawns during the Solar Eclipse event and passes through Blocks. It can only spawn after Plantera has been defeated. Mothron attacks by lunging at the player. Occasionally it lands on blocks to lay several Mothron Eggs that will spawn Baby Mothrons if they are not destroyed in time, much like Lepus.
It is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer or its upgrades.
